name: UITextDragRequest
desc: The interface for describing the attributes of a drag activity originating in a text view.

items.name: var existingItems: [UIDragItem]
items.desc: The array of drag items present in a drag session.

items.name: var suggestedItems: [UIDragItem]
items.desc: An array of drag items that the system provides when the text drag delegate doesn't provide custom drag items.

items.name: var dragRange: UITextRange
items.desc: A range of text associated with a drag item in an active drag session that originated in a text view.

items.name: var isSelected: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether text is selected for dragging.
